scripts.build-production: webpack && bundle install && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build  --config _config.yml,_config_production.yml
scripts.build-staging: webpack && bundle install && JEKYLL_ENV=staging bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config_staging.yml
scripts.build-development: webpack --mode=development && bundle install && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config_development.yml
scripts.debug: JEKYLL_ENV=development BUNDLE_GEMFILE=Gemfile-dev bundle exec jekyll serve --config _config.yml,_config_development.yml --limit_posts 1
scripts.debug-webpack: webpack --mode=development && JEKYLL_ENV=development BUNDLE_GEMFILE=Gemfile-dev bundle exec jekyll serve --config _config.yml,_config_development.yml --limit_posts 1
scripts.debug-i: JEKYLL_ENV=development BUNDLE_GEMFILE=Gemfile-dev bundle exec jekyll serve --config _config.yml,_config_development.yml --limit_posts 1 -I
